text:
"The need for vaccine is now, we should act with speed": Uday Kotak (@udaykotak), President CII 
 
"Vaccine alone will not solve the problem, #COVID appropriate behaviour is more important than the vaccine ": Dr. Randeep Guleria, Director, AIIMS
